title: Is Tilapia a Boneless, Skinless ‘Mutant’ Fish That Is Unsafe to Eat?
subtitle: An evidence-free Internet meme says that tilapia, one of the most popular freshwater fish consumed in the United States, is "killing our families."
author: David Emery
vclaim: Tilapia is a boneless, skinless, "mutant" fish that is full of cancer-causing dioxins, is worse to eat than bacon or hamburger, and is killing our families.
